---
title: "Yiquan Gu"
---

- [Professor of Spatial Economics and Industrial Organization](https://www.henley.ac.uk/people/professor-yiquan-gu) at [Henley Business School](https://www.henley.ac.uk/), [University of Reading](http://www.reading.ac.uk/)

- [British Academy](http://www.thebritishacademy.ac.uk/) and [Bridging Responsible AI Divides](https://braiduk.org/) Innovation Fellow at the [Digital Regulation Cooperation Forum](http://www.drcf.org.uk/)

- Associate Editor, [Economic Modelling](https://www.sciencedirect.com/journal/economic-modelling)

- Main research interests: [Industrial Organization](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Industrial_organization), Digital Economy, Game Theory and Spatial Economics
